original_text: And the ass saw me, and turned from me these three times: unless she had turned from me, surely now also I had slain thee, and saved her alive.
korean_text: 나귀가 나를 보고 이같이 세 번을 돌이켜 내 앞에서 피하였느니라 나귀가 만일 돌이켜 나를 피하지 아니하였더면 내가 벌써 너를 죽이고 나귀는 살렸으리라

sentences.original_text: and turned from me these three times
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 세 번이나 나에게서 몸을 돌렸다

sentences.original_text: unless she had turned from me
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그녀가 나에게서 몸을 돌리지 않았더라면

sentences.original_text: surely now also I had slain thee
